attributes.action: make mephedrone and all cathinone compounds illegal - for human consumption or otherwise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The leathal compounds are mixed with unknown substances, so noone really knows exactly what they are taking.
They reduce inhibitions, cause drowsiness and paranoia, and lead to seizures or even death.

All legal highs made up of chemicals need to be made illegal to prevent a new generation of unemployment and dependency and prevent the innevetable tradgedy that will come with the continual use of cathinone compounds.
